content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. How can I assist you today with your home’s needs?
Listen, my AC is acting up AGAIN and if you can’t get someone out today, I’m leaving a bad review everywhere. How fast can you send someone?
I’m sorry you’re having trouble with your AC. I’ll do my best to get this scheduled as soon as possible. May I have your name for the appointment?
It’s Marissa. You better not give me the runaround.
Thank you, Marissa. Can you please provide your address so I can check the soonest possible appointment?
1429 Yucca Dr. Again, get someone out NOW or I swear I’ll go on Yelp and everywhere else.
Thanks, Marissa. I’ll check if we have availability today for your location. Can you let me know your preferred time or if you’re available all day?
Just ASAP. If not, I’ll leave my review before you can even blink.
Thank you. I’ll check for the soonest available appointment now.
We have a technician available between 4-6 PM today. Should I book that slot for you?
That’s really the soonest? Whatever, just book it. But I better not be charged extra for waiting.
You will not be charged extra for this appointment window. Booking your HVAC appointment now for today between 4-6 PM.
